feed.title: Google Cloud: API Gateway
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: API Gateway

entry.title: Announcement
entry.content: On June 9, 2025, we released an updated version of API Gateway.

entry.title: Feature
entry.content:
With this release, the limit on the number of API gateways that can be created per region is increased to **50**.
For more information, see [Quotas and limits](https://cloud.google.com/api-gateway/docs/quotas)
